attributes.action: call for the ceasure of  Israeli assets in Britain and Abroad
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: call for the ceasure of  Israeli assets in Britain and Abroad under the Charter of the United Nations (Terrorism and Dealing with Assets) Regulations 2002 Enabling Provisions - s6, on the basis that they are a Terrorist State - as defined by Avi Shlaim, Professor of International Relations Oxford University - and currently committing State Terrorism in Gaza.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
